translations: adv.无血腥地，不流血地：以不流血的方式进行。
冲突得到了无血腥的解决。

sentences.sentence: This war had to be fought fast and relatively bloodlessly.
sentences.translation: 这场战争必须速战速决，基本做到兵不血刃。

sentences.sentence: Soon after the year began, Zine el-Abidine Ben Ali, who had ruled Tunisia since 1987, and Hosni Mubarak, ruler of Egypt since 1981, were rapidly—and almost bloodlessly—forced out of power.
sentences.translation: 今年开年不久，自从1987年以来一直统治突尼斯的本 阿里、自1981年以来统治埃及的穆巴拉克，迅速地——近乎不流血的——被迫出局。
